content: The CDS Work Group is preparing to ballot CQL in the May cycle. The following presentation details the short list of items we're considering: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cOo1UkhJM-yA3VTIK_uajoRMuCIYbMku/view?usp=sharing
In particular, we're considering an aggregate clause to address some of the challenges associated with recursive query.
